titlestmt.titleproper: George Friese Collection of Plastics Union Ephemera
titlestmt.subtitle: A description of the collection at Syracuse University
titlestmt.author: MM

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: George Friese Collection of Plastics Union Ephemera
did.abstract: Collection consists of union-related pieces of ephemera from George Friese’s career in the plastics industry in the Leominster, Massachusetts area.

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: George Friese of Fitchburg, Massachusetts worked in the plastics industry in the Leominster, Massachusetts area. He was a member of the Playthings, Jewelry & Novelty Workers International Union-CIO at least from the 1940s-1950s and was employed at Du Pont Doyle Works in 1944-1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: The George Friese Collection of Plastics Union Ephemera consists of union-related pieces of ephemera from George Friese’s career in the plastics industry in the Leominster, Massachusetts area. It includes his membership cards in the Playthings, Jewelry & Novelty Workers International Union-CIO, 1946 through 1954; an employees handbook from the Du Pont Viscoloid Company from 1935; and a payment receipt from Doyle Works Employee’s union from 1944-1945.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: &scrc_name; has numerous holdings in the areas of plastics and industrial design. Please refer to &subjindex; for a complete listing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

George Friese Collection of Plastics Union Ephemera,
&su_name;

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transfer from National Plastics Center and Museum, 11/06/2008.

scopecontent.p:
1. DuPont Viscoloid Company Employee’s Handbook, 1935
2. F. D. Associates membership card, 1938
3. Doyle Works Employees Union payment receipt, May 1944 to June 1945
4. (4) Membership cards from the Playthings, Jewelry & Novelty Workers International Union-CIO, 1946, 1948, 1949, 1954
5. Booklet: Labor agreement between Nashua Plastics Co., Inc and United Novelty Workers local 66, affiliated with Playthings, Jewelry & Novelty Workers International Union-CIO, 1952-1953
